page.title: 14Games Played in Kirkby
page.content:
{Monopoly} is a popular property game involving money and buying houses.It is an old game from about 1935 and is good to play with the family.The number of players is limited to 6.Real money is not used.Made by Waddingtons game makers.
{Cluedo }is a good detective game in which there are suspects,suspence and surprise.Who murdered who? Weapons include lead piping,a revolver,a rope a candlestick and a silver dagger.Suspects include Professer Plum,the cook and Miss scarlet.Also made by Waddingtons.
{Snakes and ladders }is an old game where you either slide down snakes or climb up ladders.The first one to 100 wins.It's good fun.
